languages.text: "Ох, придется старой Риззе порыскать, чтобы найти куш, способный удовлетворить столь требовательн{mf|ого|ую} клиент{mf|а|ку}. Ну да вы во мне не сомневайтесь, я справлюсь".
"Ah, old Ryzza is going to have to do some serious prowling about before she finds something sizeable enough to satisfy so demanding a customer. But have faith in me. I'll manage."
languages.original_text: "Ох, придется старой Риззе порыскать, чтобы найти куш, способный удовлетворить столь требовательн{mf|ого|ую} клиент{mf|а|ку}. Ну да вы во мне не сомневайтесь, я справлюсь".

traits.locale_text: "Ah, old Ryzza is going to have to do some serious prowling about before she finds something sizeable enough to satisfy so demanding a customer. But have faith in me. I'll manage."
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: “啊，既然如此，老莱萨真的得好好找找，才能满足这么苛刻的客人。不过相信我，这些事情我会安排好的。”
languages.original_text: "Ah, old Ryzza is going to have to do some serious prowling about before she finds something sizeable enough to satisfy so demanding a customer. But have faith in me. I'll manage."

traits.locale_text: “啊，既然如此，老莱萨真的得好好找找，才能满足这么苛刻的客人。不过相信我，这些事情我会安排好的。”
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: 「あぁ、うるさい客を満足させるためには、相当な物を見つけないといけませんなぁ。老いぼれリザは沢山徘徊する事になりそうだ。ですが、信頼してください。きっと、なんとかなります」
languages.original_text: "Ah, old Ryzza is going to have to do some serious prowling about before she finds something sizeable enough to satisfy so demanding a customer. But have faith in me. I'll manage."

traits.locale_text: 「あぁ、うるさい客を満足させるためには、相当な物を見つけないといけませんなぁ。老いぼれリザは沢山徘徊する事になりそうだ。ですが、信頼してください。きっと、なんとかなります」
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: «La vieja Ryzza va a tener que merodear y merodear para encontrar algo que pueda satisfacer a un{mf||a} client{mf|e|a} tan exigente. Tenga fe en mí, yo lo conseguiré».
languages.original_text: "Ah, old Ryzza is going to have to do some serious prowling about before she finds something sizeable enough to satisfy so demanding a customer. But have faith in me. I'll manage."

traits.locale_text: «La vieja Ryzza va a tener que merodear y merodear para encontrar algo que pueda satisfacer a un{mf||a} client{mf|e|a} tan exigente. Tenga fe en mí, yo lo conseguiré».
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: "Ah, die alte Ryzza muss erst einmal gründlich wühlen, bis sie etwas findet, was derart anspruchsvolle Kundschaft zufriedenstellt. Aber habt Vertrauen in mich. Es wird mir gelingen."
languages.original_text: "Ah, old Ryzza is going to have to do some serious prowling about before she finds something sizeable enough to satisfy so demanding a customer. But have faith in me. I'll manage."

traits.locale_text: "Ah, die alte Ryzza muss erst einmal gründlich wühlen, bis sie etwas findet, was derart anspruchsvolle Kundschaft zufriedenstellt. Aber habt Vertrauen in mich. Es wird mir gelingen."
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: « Ah, cette bonne vieille Ryzza va donc devoir sérieusement se mettre en chasse pour trouver de quoi satisfaire {mf|un client|une cliente} aussi {mf|exigeant|exigeante}. Mais faites-moi confiance, je me débrouillerai. »
languages.original_text: "Ah, old Ryzza is going to have to do some serious prowling about before she finds something sizeable enough to satisfy so demanding a customer. But have faith in me. I'll manage."

traits.locale_text: « Ah, cette bonne vieille Ryzza va donc devoir sérieusement se mettre en chasse pour trouver de quoi satisfaire {mf|un client|une cliente} aussi {mf|exigeant|exigeante}. Mais faites-moi confiance, je me débrouillerai. »
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: "Ya, Koca Ryzza'nın etrafı iyice koklayıp böylesi talepkâr bir müşteriyi tatmin etmek için bayağı kallavi bir şeyler bulması gerekecek. Sen bana güven, halledeceğim."
languages.original_text: "Ah, old Ryzza is going to have to do some serious prowling about before she finds something sizeable enough to satisfy so demanding a customer. But have faith in me. I'll manage."

traits.locale_text: "Ah, Koca Ryzza'nın etrafı iyice koklayıp, böylesi talepkâr bir müşteriyi tatmin etmek için bayağı kallavi bir şeyler bulması gerekecek. Ama güven bana, hallederim."
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4
